Translations.Text: Ani Aqdhifihi Fi At-Tabuti Faqdhifihi Fi Al-Yammi Falyulqihi Al-Yammu Bis-Sahili Ya'khudh/hu `Aduwun Li Wa`aduwun Lahu Wa 'Alqaytu `Alayka Mahabbatan Minni Wa Litusna`a `Ala `Ayni

Idh Tamshi 'Ukhtuka Fataqulu Hal 'Adullukum `Ala Man Yakfuluhu Faraja`naka 'Ila 'Ummika Kay Taqarra `Aynuha Wa La Tahzana Wa Qatalta Nafsaan Fanajjaynaka Mina Al-Ghammi Wa Fatannaka Futunaan Falabithta Sinina Fi 'Ahli Madyana Thumma Ji'ta `Ala Qadarin Ya Musa
Adh/hab 'Anta Wa 'Akhuka Bi'ayati Wa La Taniya Fi Dhikri
Faqula Lahu Qawlaan Layyinaan La`allahu Yatadhakkaru 'Aw Yakhsha
Fa'tiyahu Faqula 'Inna Rasula Rabbika Fa'arsil Ma`ana Bani 'Isra'ila Wa La Tu`adhibhum Qad Ji'naka Bi'ayatin Min Rabbika Wa As-Salamu `Ala Mani Attaba`a Al-Huda
Inna Qad 'Uhiya 'Ilayna 'Anna Al-`Adhaba `Ala Man Kadhaba Wa Tawalla
Qala Rabbuna Al-Ladhi 'A`ta Kulla Shay'in Khalqahu Thumma Hada
Qala `Ilmuha `Inda Rabbi Fi Kitabin La Yađillu Rabbi Wa La Yansa
Al-Ladhi Ja`ala Lakumu Al-'Arđa Mahdaan Wa Salaka Lakum Fiha Subulaan Wa 'Anzala Mina As-Sama'i Ma'an Fa'akhrajna Bihi 'Azwajaan Min Nabatin Shatta
Kulu Wa Ar`aw 'An`amakum 'Inna Fi Dhalika La'ayatin Li'wli An-Nuha
